https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iYr2MGPOCNiTF5IzrO6ZmoMKbSH.jpg Charlie is a troublesome 18-year-old who breaks out of a youth drug treatment clinic, but when he returns home to Los Angeles, he's given an intervention by his parents and forced to go to an adult rehab. There, he meets a beautiful but troubled girl, Eva, and is forced to battle with drugs, elusive love and divided parents. Being Charlie
